meta.title: The Impostor Rules - How to Play
meta.description: Learn how to play The Impostor. Complete rules, scoring system and tips.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: is a game where in each match, players must discover who among them is the Impostor: an infiltrator who doesn't know a secret word that everyone else knows, and must blend in while trying to figure it out to win.
introduction.recommendationText: A minimum of 4 players is required. It's ideal to play in person or via video call to facilitate the clue round and debate.

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: The objective depends on your role. Games last a maximum of
objective.friendDescription: Discover the Impostor by voting for them in the elimination round. The more correct votes you accumulate, the more points you earn.
objective.impostorDescription: Survive all 3 rounds without being discovered. If you survive the third round, you win the game.

step1.title: Host:
step1.text: One player enters the website, logs in and creates the game. They choose if the Impostor will have a

step2.title: Invitation:
step2.text: The Host shares the invite link with the other players.

step3.title: Join:
step3.text: Other players enter the link, log in and automatically join the room.

step4.title: Start:
step4.text: When everyone is in the room, the Host starts the game.

step1.title: Card Dealing
step1.text: The app assigns roles and the secret word.
step1.warning: Don't tell anyone what card you got!
step1.impostorText: Doesn't see the word. If help is enabled, they'll see the category it belongs to.

step2.title: Clue Round
step2.text: When it's your turn, you must give a clue related to the word (out loud or via chat depending on the mode).
step2.tip: It shouldn't be too obvious (to not help the Impostor) or too vague (to not seem suspicious).

step3.title: Debate and Voting
step3.text: Once everyone has given their clue, voting begins. When everyone votes, the result is revealed.

step4.title: Resolution
step4.text1: The player with the most votes is
step4.text2: and won't play the next round.
step4.ifImpostorText: The game ends and the Impostor loses.
step4.ifFriendText: The Impostor survives, earns points and the game continues for another round.

scoring.title: Scoring System
scoring.friendsVote: For each round you vote for the impostor:
scoring.friendsBonus: Bonus (vote correctly all rounds and impostor loses):
scoring.tieText: If there's a tie in the vote, no one is eliminated and the Impostor gets their points for that round.
